about_the_game: In this single player demo, you will fight your way through the first ten levels where you will fight the first Boss of the game, a heavily armored attacker with plenty of firepower to put you and your tower out of commission.  Place your towers wisely and don't forget some enemies will attack you directly rather than go for your tower!  Upgrade your towers, equipment, and yourself to become the Defender Of Falyndor.
detailed_description: In this single player demo, you will fight your way through the first ten levels where you will fight the first Boss of the game, a heavily armored attacker with plenty of firepower to put you and your tower out of commission.  Place your towers wisely and don't forget some enemies will attack you directly rather than go for your tower!  Upgrade your towers, equipment, and yourself to become the Defender Of Falyndor.
name: Defender Of Falyndor Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: In this single player demo, you will fight your way through the first ten levels where you will fight the first Boss of the game, a heavily armored attacker with plenty of firepower to put you and your tower out of commission. Place your towers wisely and don't forget some enemies will attack you directly rather than go for your tower!
